lines.text: I gave nitrous oxide at first, to get him under.
Oh yes, stuff the dentist gives you, hmmm -- commonly known as "laughing gas."
Used to be -- actually the impurities cause the laughs.
Oh, just the same as in our music halls.
[dictating a report about the murder case]
"In view of my failure - correction, comparative failure - I feel that I have no alternative but to offer you, sir, my resignation, in the sincere hope that you will not accept it." Full stop.
I do hope everything can be arranged discreetly.
Umm, shouldn't think so for a moment.
Why not? Press? Do they have to be seen?
I don't mind; they always give me a good write-up.
If I were you, I'd have a nice cup of cocoa and go to bed.
